column4: Commits first major bank robbery in Atlanta, GA

column4: Bombs home of Jewish leader, Morris Amitay

column4: Bombs of synagogue in Chattanooga, TN

column3: Goes to Madison, WI, robs a bank, plans to shoot Archie Simonson but instead shoots an interracial couple, Alphonse Manning (23) and Toni Schwenn (23).
column4: Goes to Madison, WI, robs a bank, plans to shoot Archie Simonson but instead shoots an interracial couple, Alphonse Manning (23) and Toni Schwenn (23).

column4: Drives to Dallas, TX buys a Remington 30.06

column4: Robs a bank in Columbus, Ohio

column3: Kills Gerald Gordon (42) and wounds William Ash (30) in St. Louis, MO (Remington 700)
column4: Kills Gerald Gordon (42) and wounds William Ash (30) in St. Louis, MO (Remington 700)

column3: Kills Johnny Brookshire (22) and wounds (paralyzed) his white girlfriend, Joy Williams (23), in Atlanta, GA
column4: Kills Johnny Brookshire (22) and wounds (paralyzed) his white girlfriend, Joy Williams (23), in Atlanta, GA

column3: Wounds/paralyzes Hustler magazine publisher Larry Flynt in Lawrenceville, GA (.44)
column4: Wounds/paralyzes Hustler magazine publisher Larry Flynt in Lawrenceville, GA (.44)

column3: Wounds Gene Reeves (latter recovers) (.44)
column4: Wounds Gene Reeves (latter recovers) (.44)

column3: Robs a bank in Louisville, KY
Robs a bank in Atlanta, GA
Shoots an interracial couple at Pizza Hut – kills Bryant Tatum, and wounds his girlfriend, Nancy Diane Hilton(18)
Robs a bank in Montgomery, AL
Returns to Alabama and meets Anita Carden (16) in an ice cream shop, they begin dating
Franklin and Anita get married in DeKalb County Courthouse (Atlanta, GA)
Shoots and kills Harold McIver (29) at Taco Bell in Doraville, GA (30.30)
Kills Raymond Taylor at Burger King in Falls Church, VA (30.30)
First offspring – Montgomery, AL
Shoots and kills a mixed-race couple Jesse Taylor (42) and Marian Vera Bressette (31) in Oklahoma City, OK
Cheats on his wife and kills prostitute Mercedes Masters (15) after admission of interracial relations
Kills Black man, Lawrence Reese (22), at fried chicken fast food restaurant
Kills Leo Thomas Watkins (19) through plate glass of convenience store in Indianapolis shopping mall (30.30)
Franklin and his wife Anita separate.
Kills hitchhiking student Rebecca Bergstorm in Mill Bluff State Park, WI
Shoots civil rights leader. Vernon Jordan. in Fort Wayne, IN
Kills cousins Darrell Layne (14) and Dante Evans Brown (13) in Cincinnati, OH
Kills Arthur Smothers (22) and Kathleen Mikula (16) in Johnstown, PA
Robs a bank in Burlington, NC
Kills hitchhikers Nancy Santomero (19) and Vicki Durian (26) in Pocahontas, WV (.44 Ruger)
Kills Ted Fields (20) and David Martin (18) in Salt Lake City, UT (Marlin lever action)
Franklin is arrested in Florence, Kentucky and then escapes from the police department/
Franklin is recaptured in Lakeland, FL
Extradited to Salt Lake City, UT and arraigned for the murders of Ted Fields and David Martin.
Federal Trial – convicted of violating the civil rights of Fields and Martin and sentenced to two consecutive life sentences

State Trial – convicted of killing Fields and Martin, sentenced to two more life sentence due to hung jury regarding death penalty (attempted escape but recaptured) sent to Medical Center for Federal Prisoners in Springfield MI
Transferred to United States Penitentiary in Marion, IL to begin serving life sentences
Stabbed 15 times in the neck and abdomen by a group of African Americans
Federal Trial – found not guilty for violating the civil rights of Vernon Jordan
Partially confesses to the Larry Flynt shooting
Confesses to shooting of Larry Flynt and bombing Morris Amitay’s house in Washington DC

Confesses to the murder of Rebecca Bergstrom; the murders of Santomero and Durian; Chattanooga synagogue bombing (tried in July and sentenced to 15-20yrs for bombing & 6-10yrs for possession of explosives), Rainbow murders, shooting Alphonse Manning (23) and Toni Schwenn (23)
Convicted in Wisconsin of killing Manning and Schwenn. Sentenced to two consecutive life sentences
Admits to Killing Ted Fields and David Martin in Salt Lake City, UT
Jacob Beard is found guilty of two counts of 1st-Degree murder for the Rainbow murders of Satomero and Durian although Franklin confessed to the murders
Franklin confesses to killing Gerald Gordon
Admits to shooting Vernon Jordan
Tells Deborah Dixon, WKRC Cincinnati reporter, that he killed Santomero and Durian because “They dated black people”
Found guilty of killing Gerald Gordon and sentenced to death
column4: Found guilty of killing Gerald Gordon and sentenced to death

column3: Admits to killing Raymond Taylor
column4: Admits to killing Raymond Taylor

column3: Admits to murdering Arthur Smothers and Kathleen Mikula. Later confesses to murdering Darrell Lane and Dante Evans Brown
column4: Admits to murdering Arthur Smothers and Kathleen Mikula. Later confesses to murdering Darrell Lane and Dante Evans Brown

column3: Found guilty of murdering Darrell Lane and Dante Evans Brown, sentenced to 40 years to life in prison.
column4: Found guilty of murdering Darrell Lane and Dante Evans Brown, sentenced to 40 years to life in prison.

column3: Admits to killing William Tatum, pleads and receives two concurrent life sentences (one for murder and one for robbery)
column4: Admits to killing William Tatum, pleads and receives two concurrent life sentences (one for murder and one for robbery)

column3: Confesses to killing prostitute Mercedes Masters and Harold McIver
column4: Confesses to killing prostitute Mercedes Masters and Harold McIver

column3: Confesses to killing Johnny Brookshire in 1978
column4: Confesses to killing Johnny Brookshire in 1978

column3: Jacob Beard is retried for the Rainbow murders and found not guilty
column4: Jacob Beard is retried for the Rainbow murders and found not guilty

column3: US District Court requires Missouri to release or retry Franklin for the Gerald Gordon murder
column4: US District Court requires Missouri to release or retry Franklin for the Gerald Gordon murder

column3: Federal Judge puts the death penalty in Missouri on hold over concerns involving lethal injection.
column4: Federal Judge puts the death penalty in Missouri on hold over concerns involving lethal injection.

column3: Federal Appellate Court overturns U.S. District Court decision
column4: Federal Appellate Court overturns U.S. District Court decision

column3: U.S. Supreme Court decides that the current method of execution (lethal injection) is constitutionally permissible
column4: U.S. Supreme Court decides that the current method of execution (lethal injection) is constitutionally permissible

column3: US Supreme court refuses to hear Missouri lethal injection case Clemons v. Crawford, lethal injection stands as permissible and Missouri attorney general states executions will begin again.
column4: US Supreme court refuses to hear Missouri lethal injection case Clemons v. Crawford, lethal injection stands as permissible and Missouri attorney general states executions will begin again.
